messages.message:
We now have a simple way to grant “execute scripts / UDFs” permission across the entire Instabase installation! See the documentation here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase-docs/pull/82

Thank you @Heymian and @Jessica for the colloboration and creating the frontend / backend to make this happen!

Many have requested this or been bitten by the difficulty of doing it during a training: @Kerry @hollenscary @laura @Matt @Anant + others
Yes finally!!! This is awesome great job @Heymian @Jessica!
